The US is a global outlier for mandating our kids wear masks in schools. Mask mandates and remote learning have resulted in significant learning loss and social-emotional development disruptions that will last for years to come.

Unmask our kids and keep them in the classroom.

No municipality or government should be mandating kids to wear masks in schools or public spaces. The science is clear that children are at the least risk from COVID, and masks have long-term harmful effects on kids' social/emotional development.

It's time to unmask our kids.
